title: Jordyn Woods wears barely there Cleopatra costume amid reports she misses Kylie Jenner
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Jordyn Woods looked incredible in her Halloween costume as she posed for selfies on her Instagram .

She dressed up as Cleopatra and donned a barely there gold chain bra, with a gold and white skirt with a slit up the side and lots of gold bling.

The model, 22, also wore dramatic make up inspired by the ancient Egyptians including graphic blue eyeliner in a drop formation underneath her eye.

She leant towards the camera in a video she posted, which almost revealed everything as her tiny bra was expertly glued on

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She captioned her post with a Frank Ocean lyric: "I found my black queen CLEOPATRA".

Her fans were awed by the racy costume, with one commenting: "Wow ... that’s all I can say".

"Okayyyyyyyyyyyyyyy hold on we have a winner here you won", added another.

"Omg your makeup looks gorg", commented a third.

In Touch recently revealed that Jordyn still misses her former best pal Kylie Jenner .

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The two used to be inseparable and lived together, until it all fell apart dramatically when Jordyn kissed Tristan Thompson, the then boyfriend of Kylie's sister Khloe Kardashian .

A source told In Touch : "Despite the fallout between the former BFFs, Jordyn's brand is doing really well", referring to Jordyn's ambassador role with Boohoo.

"She's in a good place and no longer feels the need to rely on the Kardashians to be successful.

"But at the same time, there was more to their friendship than fame and fortune, and even now she goes through phases of missing Kylie and Stormi."

(Image: Instagram)

After the scandalous kiss, Khloe split from Tristan, the father of her daughter True, Kylie stopped speaking to Jordyn, and all hell broke loose within the tight-knit family.

Jordyn's mother Elizabeth posted an Instagram that claimed all of her daughter's friends had left her because of her antics with Tristan.

Elizabeth said: "Thank you @teenvogue for such a beautiful and real interview with @jordynwoods ! To incorporate @jodiewoods in this also was magical! If you get one of us, then you get all of us.

(Image: Instagram)

"To sit back and watch @jordynwoods go through all of this mental and emotional anguish has been very emotional for us and we pray for everyone daily. To see your kids hurt at any age is difficult to say the least.

"All I can say is that I hope everyone out there is perfect and no one has to ever endure any bumps along the journey of growing.

"To watch the majority of her friends leave her, not be able to go get services where she got accustomed to going and get bullied by the world, it takes a strong ass family and individual to be able to deal with that on a daily basis.

(Image: Getty Images North America)

"I am proud of your strength, your love of family and God, and your willingness to everyday want to move forward and do something positive @jordynwoods !!

"We are praying that friendships can be mended as life is short and no one is perfect.

"All those who truly know her and us, know that love is all we have to give. We for real got this and for life I have the most valuable gift, my family #teamigotthis #mamawoods"
description: Jordyn Woods posed in a Cleopatra Halloween costume after "admitting" she missed ex BFF Kylie Jenner
